Articles.Content: So I have the core of my mun base landed and ready for more parts to be added, but I dont understand how to do the precision maneuvers required for docking on the surface of the mun. I only use stock parts, and the only mod I use is Kerbal Engineer.

There are two ways I have gone about this.

First is to build a rover base. Why a rover base? So you can connect the ports from the side by driving into eachother and deploying landing gear to raise the part up if need be.

Second is to build vertically and use RCS to lift your part up and float it over to the other section. Could also be done with a skycrane but I find RCS is more forgiving.

Third, and preferred method is hang all that crap I just said and get KAS.

If it's landing close enough that you mean then what you're looking for is pinpoint landing.

You can use the search function for more, can try searching for precision landing as well.

when I build my mun Base, I used the following,

I create a Rover Craft so that I can dock with my Mun modules and move them around, after I had lifted the legs on the modules, and once I had dock the sad craft, I lower the legs, and then undock.

the second is to have somes wheels on the craft itself so that once I had landed and craft, I would drive the craft over to the base, dock it, and then decuppled the wheels.

the main issue you have to reminder is to make sure that the docking ports are at the same height on both crafts.
When i make bases each module has wheels to drive and dock and for base module landing i have a skycrane land it for the mun its a half tank with 5 aerospikes attached by cubic struts

when I build my mun Base, I used the following,

I create a Rover Craft so that I can dock with my Mun modules and move them around, after I had lifted the legs on the modules, and once I had dock the sad craft, I lower the legs, and then undock.

the second is to have somes wheels on the craft itself so that once I had landed and craft, I would drive the craft over to the base, dock it, and then decuppled the wheels.

the main issue you have to reminder is to make sure that the docking ports are at the same height on both crafts.

I second this
